backend/main.mo: Actor provides upload, download, and delete operations for a stored project ZIP file with user‑level access control enforcement.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence records mapping social link updates to affected frontend files and components with associated metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten short summaries for many frontend source files used across the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base style definitions with extensive OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point enabling dark mode and loading the React application root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Composes all major landing‑page sections into the main application layout.
frontend/src/components/Community.tsx: Renders a grid of social platform cards or buttons using configured links with animated reveal and disabled states for missing URLs.
frontend/src/components/Features.tsx: Displays four feature cards highlighting key product attributes with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing branding, navigation, legal links, optional admin ZIP download, and external community links based on configured URLs.
frontend/src/components/Gallery.tsx: Displays a scroll-animated gallery of scene cards with images and titles, using in-view transitions and hover effects.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders a sticky site header with navigation links, wallet button, and a toggleable mobile menu with smooth section scrolling.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Creates a hero section with a parallax background, animated wolf element, headline text, and CTA buttons with in-view animations.
frontend/src/components/MemeTokenomicsCh: Generates an animated donut chart for token distribution, with hover effects and an accompanying legend that appears on scroll.
frontend/src/components/Presale.tsx: Shows presale phase details including countdown, token sale progress, and animated phase cards using scroll-triggered effects.
frontend/src/components/ProjectZipDownlo: Provides admin-only controls to download or delete a project ZIP file, handling auth checks, errors, and loading states.
frontend/src/components/Roadmap.tsx: Animated roadmap section displaying four project phases with icons, cards, and scroll-triggered transitions.
frontend/src/components/Story.tsx: Story section with background imagery, animated card text, and a visual scene that fades in on scroll.
frontend/src/components/Tokenomics.tsx: Tokenomics section showing token distribution, an animated chart, allocation table, and whitepaper-style details.
Generates an animated donut chart using SVG paths and displays a responsive legend tied to scroll visibility.
frontend/src/config/socialLinks.ts: Central configuration of social media link metadata with placeholders for URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountdown.ts: Provides a countdown timer hook that updates remaining time until a target date every second.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, session loading, and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInView.ts: Simple IntersectionObserver hook that reports when an element enters the viewport and then stops observing.
frontend/src/hooks/useLinearTokenProgres: Provides a React hook that calculates and updates linear token sale progress over time based on phase dates and baseline tokens sold.
frontend/src/hooks/useParallax.ts: Implements a parallax scroll hook that updates offset based on scroll position and user motion preferences.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines an example React Query hook that runs only when an actor is available from useActor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles, CSS variables, dark mode values, and utility classes including glow and animation effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider and imports global CSS.
frontend/src/utils/adminGate.ts: Checks URL and hash parameters to determine if admin mode should be enabled client‑side.
frontend/src/utils/projectZipDownload.ts: Provides a helper to download ZIP data by creating a Blob and triggering a browser download.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and extended theme values.
project_state.json: Contains project metadata, existing features, pending requests, and configuration for the social media links project.
